mapper.select: select * from timeslot where timeSlotDate > #{startDate} and timeSlotStatus = 'AVAILABLE'
mapper.insert: insert into timeslot(timeSlotId, timeSlotDate, slot, timeSlotStatus) values (null, #{timeSlot.timeSlotDate}, #{timeSlot.slot}, #{timeSlot.timeSlotStatus})
mapper.select: select * from timeslot order by timeSlotId desc limit 1
